intro.title: Intro
intro.chests_description: Open boxes and win different prizes from them!
intro.rewards_description: Win Tokens, USDT, More Keys and Upcoming NFTs or Cryptocurrencies!

home.title: Game
home.click_on_box: Click on a box to open it
home.reward_description: Unlock amazing rewards: from coins and USDT to valuable keys for extra reopens. You can open new box every 4 hours!

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Buy more keys to get better prizes

airdrop.title: Airdrop
airdrop.description: By connecting your Ton Wallet, you can participate in the airdrop and receive rewards directly into your wallet.
airdrop.steps_list: To join the airdrop, follow these steps:
airdrop.third_step: Wait for the airdrop rewards to be distributed!
airdrop.details_first_question: What will affect the amount of tokens you receive?
airdrop.details_first_answer_1: Your current income in the game.
airdrop.details_first_answer_2: Your activity and engagement in the game.
airdrop.details_first_answer_3: The number of friends you invite to the game.
airdrop.details_second_question: The more you interact with the game and share it with others, the higher your token rewards will be!
airdrop.details_second_answer_1: Once you’ve received your tokens, you’ll be able to exchange them on popular exchanges such as OKX and ByBit for USDT (Tether). Keep an eye on the airdrop page for updates and detailed instructions on how to exchange your tokens.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.withdraw_steps: To make withdraw, follow these steps:

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: You and your friend will get bonus
friends.complex_baunty: both for you and your friend

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.login_description: Log in to the app every day to complete this task and track your daily streak. The more days in a row you log in, the bigger the reward!
tasks.open_chest_description: Open a chest to complete this task and receive a reward.
tasks.share_story_description: Share the game story in Telegram to spread the word and receive tokens. Simply click "Share Story" and let your friends see what you’ve accomplished!
tasks.invite_friends_description: Invite your friends to join the game using your referral link. Complete each level of the task by inviting the specified number of friends and earn increasing rewards.
tasks.connect_wallet_description: Connect your wallet via TON Connect to receive tokens as a reward. Secure your rewards and enjoy all the features of the game!
tasks.make_transaction_description: Complete a test transaction of 0.5 TON to earn tokens. This quick approval helps to unlock your game bonuses!
tasks.bybit_registration_description: Register on ByBit using our referral link and get a reward.
tasks.bybit_validation_description: Complete the KYC verification on ByBit and get a reward.
tasks.bybit_deposit_description: Make a deposit to your ByBit account and get a reward.
